duration.$description: Shimmer animation duration. Smooth, not too fast or slow.

easing.$description: Animation easing function. Linear for consistent shimmer movement.

width.$description: Width of shimmer gradient. 200% ensures smooth transition across element.

step.$description: Delay step between consecutive skeletons in a wave animation group. Creates sequential shimmer effect.

max.$description: Maximum stagger delay. Prevents too long delays for elements beyond 8th position.
